;----------------------------
; Start of Draggable Switches Support Section
; Added by Swordmaster on 16 Jun 2013
;----------------------------
; orthogonal DTR A2 switch
0x53948700,3,0,0x03031500,1,0=0x53948700,3,0,0x53948800,3,0
0x53948700,3,0,0x03031500,3,0=0x53948700,3,0,0x53948800,3,0
0x53948700,1,1,0x03031500,1,0=0x53948700,1,1,0x53948800,1,1
0x53948700,1,1,0x03031500,3,0=0x53948700,1,1,0x53948800,1,1
; orthogonal DTR B2 switch
0x53949100,0,0,0x5f33fc00,0,0=0x53949100,0,0,0x53949400,0,0
0x53949100,2,1,0x5f33fc00,0,0=0x53949100,2,1,0x53949400,2,1
0x53949600,0,0,0x5f33fc00,0,0=0x53949600,0,0,0x53949800,0,0
0x53949600,2,1,0x5f33fc00,0,0=0x53949600,2,1,0x53949800,2,1
0x53949900,3,0,0x03001a00,2,0=0x53949900,3,0,0x53949a00,3,0
0x53949900,1,1,0x03001a00,1,0=0x53949900,1,1,0x53949a00,1,1
